alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 3:46AM CDT until July 14 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 330 AM MDT. * At 246 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Merriman to 19 miles west of Medicine Lake to 16 miles southeast of Gordon, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gordon, Merriman, Medicine Lake, Highway 61 crossing the Snake River, Steer Creek Campground, Irwin, Schoolhouse Lake, Intersection of Highway 20 and Irwin Road, Rock Hill, Bayonne, Intersection of Highway 27 and Mills Road, Anderson Bridge State Wildlife Management Area, Highway 61 Crossing The Niobrara River, Indian Hill, Intersection of Highway 61 and Shadbolt Road and Round Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 106 and 135. Highway 61 between mile markers 195 and 225. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
